---
title: List Outputs
description: 'How to list outputs'
image: /img/logo/iota_mark_light.png

  - how to
  - list outputs
  - nodejs
  - python
  - rust
---

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

This guide will show you how to list all the outputs that can be unlocked by any address of an account.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx) and [sync it](./check-balance.mdx).
2. Get all the [`Outputs`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/enum.Output.html)
   related to the `Account` by calling the [`Account.outputs()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.AccountInner.html#method.outputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_outputs.rs#L34-L36
```

</div>

3. Get all the unspent `Outputs` related to the `Account` by calling the
   [`Account.unspent_outputs()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.AccountInner.html#method.unspent_outputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_outputs.rs#L40-L42
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx) and [sync it](./check-balance.mdx).
2. Get all the [`Outputs`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Output.md)
   related to the `Account` by calling the [`Account.outputs()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#outputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list-outputs.ts#L29-L32
```

</div>

3. Get all the unspent `Outputs` related to the `Account` by calling the

[`Account.unspentOutputs()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#unspentoutputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list-outputs.ts#L34-L37
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx) and [sync it](./check-balance.mdx).
2. Get all the [`Outputs`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/output.md)
   related to the `Account` by calling the [`Account.outputs()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#outputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_outputs.py#L19
```

</div>

3. Get all the unspent `Outputs` related to the `Account` by calling the
   [`Account.unspent_outputs()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#unspent_outputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_outputs.py#L27
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

</TabItem>

```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

0x738d5c74d03aa5e954e4028a963d42d5f2283d24d69abc994dcb89f55dd3f67c0300
0x0064264678bcb9df0d33c994dbf5929acbba9524e0af8eb6cc43308f38f1a36c0100
0x033f3766d7f202d82af52a17242da3747d9e51ca79704854307fe30a67526a540100
0xde54940601a3153f4cae4986ee83853ee17c7eae389a0d1d7b7c678c6dec5f200500
0x3461e923da5e8222fac50397493d2237030d3ad743ecce141300de94774417560000
0x64aa46c5008b9d361318b50d5d1928dbe14cef3ba94e3876133c8eb33445910e0200
Unspent output ids:
0xde54940601a3153f4cae4986ee83853ee17c7eae389a0d1d7b7c678c6dec5f200500

0x3082022d3b3d3fc7b93de55d908b19fec88751f6b260704dace4b9a8d3752ef80200

0x22efc1c85c925d3cea275b355ef37c8c0795713ac5c0a1ec3d6634d6e9d134160000
```
